Name: Chocolat Rush
About the game: The sweetest VR game, with 99.9% cacao fun! A fun-packed casual shooter for people of all ages. “I can't imagine a world without chocolate!” I'm a big fan of chocolate and my mom nags me all the time me for it: “Honey, if you eat too much chocolate, chocolate monsters will come to get you in your dream!” Listen – every one of you who loves chocolate the most! Super powerful chocolate monsters are swarming in! This is a bittersweet chocolate war taking place on a kitchen table, shown from the perspective of a kid! ◼︎ Powerful toy gun: Using more than six different types of toy guns, including shotguns and laser guns, take down chocolate monsters in many creative ways. ◼︎ Various chocolate monsters: Meet all kinds of chocolate monsters, like Milk Chocolate, Dark Chocolate, Teeny-Tiny Chocolate, and Buffy Chocolate. Blow them up in the most exciting ways. ◼︎ Formidable boss: Each boss has a different set of skills and weak spots. Find their weak spots and defeat them. ◼︎ Leaderboard: Compete with your family, friends, and partner. See your score on the leaderboard and find out who is the best. ◼︎ Casual shoot-em-up game for VR: With a game design that is tailored for VR, enjoy an optimal shooting experience. Benefits of Chocolat Rush, the VR game with 99.9% cacao fun: 1. Get rid of your stress with exciting shooting effects 2. Feel the anti-aging antioxidant effect of childhood nostalgia Welcome to the sweet Chocolat Rush!
